data.message: Eminem,  we love you dude but seriously you need to sign an artist that can actually pull his weight son. I mean shadyxv rocked but you carried the album. Just like you carry the label. Once you're gone who's going to be able to uphold the label the way you do. Because I can tell you right now none of your artists have what it takes to carry the crown you built and are still wearing. No offense to any of em cuz there all good. But there not you or have your skill. You need to sign someone who is as fearless as yourself and your artists all have a fear in them. Or they'd be calling out more fakes like you used to in your prime

replies.message:
No need to call out fakes Im murdering the Devil
